data.comment: The big names in today's match at Sangju Civic Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Sangju.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Sangju.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Kim Bo-seob gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kang Sang-uh scores to make it 1-0 at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ulsan Hyundai's Junior Negrao gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sangju Sangmu defender.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Sangju, Sangju Sangmu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Kim Bo-seob of Sangju Sangmu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 13, Ulsan Hyundai's Joo-ho Park is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 14, Ulsan Hyundai attack but Dave Bulthuis's header doesn't find the target.
Dae Yong Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Kim In-sung grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 15, That's a fine assist from Koh Myeong-jin.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 18, Goal! Junior Negrao gives Ulsan Hyundai a 1-2 lead in Sangju.
Seol Young-woo with an assist there.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 20, Kim In-sung for Ulsan Hyundai has been booked by Dae Yong Kim and receives a first yellow card.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In Sangju, Junior Negrao of Ulsan Hyundai is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 25, Dave Bulthuis (Ulsan Hyundai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 27, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a throw-in for Sangju Sangmu, close to Ulsan Hyundai's area.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 28, Dae Yong Kim signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Ulsan Hyundai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 42, Sangju Sangmu's Kim Bo-seob misses with an attempt on goal.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Sangju Civic Stadium.
It's now 1-3 in Sangju as Junior Negrao scores for Ulsan Hyundai.
Great play from Sin Jin-ho to set up the goal.
Dae Yong Kim has blown to start the second-half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) is making a first substitution, with Seon-min Moon replacing Lee Chan-dong.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 49, Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Sangju Sangmu are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Important block from the Ulsan Hyundai defence as Park Byeong-hyeon fires in a strike for Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai are coming forward and Dave Bulthuis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 55, Dae Yong Kim signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Dae Yong Kim awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
An unfortunate own goal by Kim Jin-hyeok makes the score 1-4.
In the minute 60, Kang Sang-uh gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sangju Sangmu.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu's Oh Se-Hun goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 61, In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sangju Sangmu are pushing forward but Han Seok-jong's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
In the minute 62, Ulsan Hyundai make their first substitution with Bjorn Johnsen replacing Junior Negrao.
In Sangju Sangju Sangmu drive forward through Seon-min Moon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu's Park Byeong-hyeon has been booked in Sangju.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 68, The home team replace Park Yong-woo with Lee Dong-su.
Sangju Sangmu pushes forward through Lee Dong-su, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 72, The away team have replaced Koh Myeong-jin with Lee Dong-kyeong. This is the second substitution made today by Kim Do-Hoon.
Dae Yong Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 75, Park Se-jin is on a sub for Kim Bo-seob for Sangju Sangmu.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu's Seon-min Moon gets in a shot on goal at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 79, Oh Se-Hun of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
In the minute 81, Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Lee Keun-ho is replacing Chung-Yong Lee for the away team.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu just outside Ulsan Hyundai's area.
In the minute 84, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Red card in Sangju! Park Byeong-hyeon has been shown a second yellow card by Dae Yong Kim.
Ulsan Hyundai's Bjorn Johnsen misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Goal! Ulsan Hyundai extend their lead to 1-5 through Lee Dong-kyeong.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, At Sangju Civic Stadium, Lee Dong-kyeong has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Sangju Sangmu!
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Dae Yong Kim awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
That's full-time at Sangju Civic Stadium. The final score is 1-5.
Dave Bulthuis (Ulsan Hyundai) has received a first yellow card.
